sn37.26:1: "Bhikkhus, there are five powers of a woman … .as above… When a woman possesses these five powers, she dwells at home having won over her husband."[n.266]Sāmikaṃ pasayha agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.Spkglossespasayhawithabhibhavitvā,and in the next suttaabhibhuyya vattatiwithabhibhavati ajjhottharati.In this way the two become simply verbal variants on the same idea.
